title: Dark Priest
description: Escape into a fantasy world full of magic and miracles. REVENGE. THAT’S ALL CHANDOR WANTS. Chandor has spent four years training with the Guardians, an elite order of holy knights, famed throughout the land for the miraculous powers granted to them by the Gods. With his novitiate complete, he starts hunting the monster that brutally murdered his family. But as he follows the trail of destruction from magnificent cities to ruined castles, past dragon lairs and through dwarven strongholds, he sees the devastating power of his enemy. He realises he would have to become a Dark Priest, practitioner of forbidden miracles, to succeed against his terrifying supernatural adversary. He was prepared to die for revenge. But the stakes are no longer just life and death; now his very soul is at risk. South African author, Dale Vice, brings you another action-packed heroic fantasy adventure that is thought provoking, uplifting and vastly entertaining. “Spellbinding from page one.” “Dale’s latest novel will leave your heart pounding, your mind reeling and your spirit soaring.”
author: Dale Vice
